column1: #Text=Korra says : " Way cooler than a makeover . "
#Text=Asami says : " This is where Future Industries test - drives their Satomobiles .
#Text=" Asami says : " You want me to take you for a spin ?
#Text=I did n't think we 'd make it .
#Text=" Asami says : " Well , you ca n't be afraid to mix it up sometimes .
#Text=" Korra says : " I got ta admit , I had you pegged wrong .
#Text=I thought you were kind of ... prissy .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's all right , people usually assume that I 'm daddy 's helpless little girl , but I can handle myself .
#Text=I mean , I 've been in self - defense classes since I was this high .
#Text=My dad made sure that I would always be able to protect myself .
